reuters.title: TELECAST <TCST> COMPLETES ACQUISITION FINANCING
reuters.body: Telecast Inc said it closed on the financing portion of its previously-announced acquisition of approximately 14,600 hotel rooms from <Dynavision Inc>. The three mln dlr financing package was provided by Sanwa Business Credit Corp, a subsidiary of <Sanwa Bank Ltd> of Japan, the company said. Reuter 
